> This provides a set of Link relationships. A GET /example.com may
> return a Cache-Control header to state how long the representation is
> valid for, which in turn could mean how long are the Link  
> relationships
> valid for.
>
Though technically valid to say so, it would be difficult to write  
client code like this. To support such a behavior, clients will have  
behave like caches, and that's a tall order.

Subbu
